name: Taxi By Night
description:
This game was mane in 5 days for #VampireJam.

You play as a vampire taxi driver in the city of New Wenders. Talk with passengers and decide whether you want to feed on them or not.

I wanted to do more story bits, but ended up spending a lot of time with the 3d aspects of the game. This game takes place in the same universe as another game I am working on.

I used this game jam in order to learn some things I never used before:

- 3D Scenes and Lighting
- Timeline
- Cinemachine
- Occlusion Culling
- Fungus Framework

3D Models by Quaternius
Music by Kevin MacLeod
